thread.title: Bigg Boss 10: Om Swami Makes A Ridiculous Accusation About Salman Khan
thread.title_full: Bigg Boss 10: Om Swami Makes A Ridiculous Accusation About Salman Khan

author: Divya Rao
title: Bigg Boss 10: Om Swami Makes A Ridiculous Accusation About Salman Khan
text:
Divya Rao Jan . 6 . 2017 Om Swami 
Bigg Boss 10 contestant Om Swami has been thrown out of the show after he indulged in a filthy act of throwing his pee on Bani and Rohan . The man was asked to leave the house but he made such a hue and cry about it, that BB had to send security to escort him outside. Post his eviction, he has been making all sorts of claims to the media – the weirdest one being – Salman Khan is an ISI agent! 
According to a report in India Today, Om Swami claimed that Khan is antinational and is a spy for ISI. He also went on to add that the other contestants in the house wanted to kill him by poisoning his food. Umm, where would they get poison from in the first place?! Anyway, he even said that Bani was sleeping with Jason Shah in the house. 
If this doesn’t prove how filthy this man’s mind is, I don’t know what will. Absolutely appalling. Reportedly, Salman is all set to address this issue today and we can’t wait to hear what he has to say. 23
